channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge pauses Trump federal employee buyout offer pending court hearing
item.description: A lawsuit says the Trump administration's offer of a buyout to federal employees is unlawful, noting that Congress has not appropriated money for it.

item.title: Is the U.S. jobs market much weaker than it looks? We’re about to find out.
Trump sued over purge at NLRB, regulator targeted by SpaceX, Amazon and others
item.description: The NLRB has come under fire from companies including Amazon and Elon Musk's SpaceX, who have argued that the labor board's structure is unconstitutio...

item.title: DraftKings' stock may be less risky Super Bowl bet than a Travis Kelce touchdown
Tariffs: How they work, who pays for them and why Trump loves them
item.description: President Donald Trump in his inaugural speech credited President William McKinley for making the United States "very rich" through tariffs.

item.title: Cannabis stocks extend gains on RFK Jr. committee vote, Senate banking comments
Inside the fight to stop Elon Musk and DOGE from accessing your financial info
Trump administration demands lists of low-performing federal workers
Trump's tax cuts are 'stuck in the mud' as Republicans split over spending
item.description: Fiscal hawks are demanding deeper cuts on major tax, energy and healthcare package that would advance key Trump administration priorities.

item.title: Amazon’s earnings are on deck. Can the stock vault back into record territory?
